statements: SELECT * FROM ShippingRoutes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT route_id, origin_location, destination_location FROM ShippingRoutes WHERE distance_km > 100;
SELECT destination_location, distance_km, estimated_time_minutes FROM ShippingRoutes WHERE origin_location = POINT(50.0, 30.0);
SELECT * FROM ShippingRoutes WHERE route_id BETWEEN 3 AND 5;
SELECT route_id, origin_location, distance_km, estimated_time_minutes FROM ShippingRoutes WHERE destination_location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM ShippingRoutes WHERE distance_km > 1000 ORDER BY route_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT route_id, distance_km, estimated_time_minutes FROM ShippingRoutes WHERE estimated_time_minutes < 120 ORDER BY distance_km ASC
SELECT origin_location, destination_location, estimated_time_minutes FROM ShippingRoutes WHERE distance_km BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY route_id ASC
SELECT route_id, origin_location, destination_location, distance_km, estimated_time_minutes FROM ShippingRoutes WHERE route_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY distance_km DESC
SELECT * FROM ShippingRoutes WHERE origin_location != destination_location ORDER BY route_id ASC
SELECT * FROM routes;
SELECT route_id, route_name FROM routes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT route_name, start_point, end_point FROM routes WHERE route_name LIKE '%Express%';
SELECT * FROM shipments WHERE weight_kg > 1000;
SELECT shipment_id, shipment_name, destination FROM shipments WHERE shipment_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT route_id, route_name FROM routes;
SELECT route_name, route_id FROM routes ORDER BY route_name DESC;
SELECT route_id, route_name, start_point FROM routes JOIN shipments ON routes.route_id = shipments.route_id WHERE weight_kg > 100;
SELECT route_id, route_name, ST_AsText(start_point) AS start_coordinates, ST_AsText(end_point) AS end_coordinates FROM routes WHERE route_id IN (1, 3, 5);

SELECT shipments.shipment_id, shipments.shipment_name, routes.route_name, routes.route_id FROM shipments LEFT JOIN routes ON shipments.route_id = routes.route_id WHERE weight_kg < 50 ORDER BY shipments.shipment_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM ShippingRoutes;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location, distance_km FROM ShippingRoutes WHERE distance_km > 100;
SELECT warehouse_id, location, capacity FROM ShippingWarehouses ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT order_id, warehouse_id, delivery_date FROM ShippingOrders WHERE delivery_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location FROM ShippingRoutes WHERE start_location <> end_location;
SELECT * FROM ShippingRoutes WHERE distance_km > 100 ORDER BY distance_km DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location FROM ShippingRoutes WHERE start_location IS NOT NULL AND end_location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location, distance_km FROM ShippingRoutes WHERE distance_km BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY distance_km;
SELECT warehouse_id, capacity FROM ShippingWarehouses WHERE capacity >= 100 ORDER BY warehouse_id;
SELECT order_id, delivery_date FROM ShippingOrders WHERE delivery_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY delivery_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, start_point, end_point, distance FROM routes;
SELECT id, location_name, coordinates FROM locations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM shipments WHERE distance > 100;
SELECT id, shipment_name, start_location_id, end_location_id FROM shipments WHERE distance < 50;
SELECT id, vehicle_name, capacity FROM vehicles ORDER BY capacity;
SELECT * FROM routes
SELECT start_point, end_point, distance FROM routes ORDER BY distance DESC
SELECT location_name, ST_X(coordinates), ST_Y(coordinates) FROM locations WHERE ST_X(coordinates) < 0
SELECT shipment_name, start_location_id, end_location_id, distance FROM shipments WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY shipment_name
SELECT vehicle_name, capacity FROM vehicles ORDER BY capacity ASC
SELECT * FROM shipping_routes;
SELECT route_name, distance FROM shipping_routes ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT destination_name, destination_geom FROM shipping_destinations WHERE destination_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM route_stops WHERE stop_order IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT route_id, status, update_time FROM route_history WHERE status = 'delayed';
SELECT * FROM shipping_routes;
SELECT route_id, route_name, ST_AsText(route_geom) AS route_geometry FROM shipping_routes WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY route_id DESC;

SELECT rs.stop_id, rs.route_id, rs.destination_id, sd.destination_name, rs.stop_order FROM route_stops rs INNER JOIN shipping_destinations sd ON rs.destination_id = sd.destination_id ORDER BY rs.stop_order;

SELECT rs.route_id, rs.departure_time, rs.arrival_time, rh.status FROM route_schedule rs LEFT JOIN route_history rh ON rs.route_id = rh.route_id WHERE rs.departure_time > NOW() ORDER BY rs.route_id, rs.departure_time DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT rs.route_id, COUNT(rs.stop_id) AS total_stops FROM route_stops rs GROUP BY rs.route_id HAVING total_stops > 2;
